item.title: Spring into Kubernetes - Part 1
item.description: Introduction Welcome to the first part in a series of blog posts looking at running Spring applications on Kubernetes. To kick the series off we’re going to take a look at the Spring Pet Clinic example application and demonstrate how we can quickly and easily get it running on Kubernetes. Step 1. Install a Kubernetes Before we get started I would encourage you to read (or at least skim) through Kelsey Hightower’s seminal Kubernetes The Hard Way to get an idea for the complexity of installing and operating a Kubernetes cluster.
